name: Southern Buttermilk Salad Dressing
description: This recipe comes from a spring holiday dinner party that Mark Bittman and Sam Sifton prepared in Charleston, S.C. They used this dressing on a blend of kale, mustard greens and collards for a springtime salad.
recipeIngredient: 2 scallions, white and green parts minced
Kosher salt and black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine everything but the buttermilk and seasoning and mix well. Whisk in the buttermilk until the dressing is smooth. Season to taste.
